# ARErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

The domain for error objects produced by an AR session.

## Declaration

```swift
let ARErrorDomain: String
```

## Handling Errors

- **session(_:didFailWithError:)**: Tells the delegate that the session has stopped running due to an error.

items.description: Tells the delegate that the session has stopped running due to an error.
items.name: session(_:didFailWithError:)
